mapper.sql: h.id id, h.title title, h.content content, h.year year, h.publishTime publishTime, h.roleId roleId, h.dScore dScore, h.lScore lScore, h.hScore hScore, h.rate rate, h.otherAttr otherAttr, h.sumScore sumScore
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO t_honorsaward (title,content,year,publishTime,roleId,dScore,lScore,hScore,rate,otherAttr,sumScore) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{year},#{publishTime},#{roleId},#{dScore},#{lScore},#{hScore},#{rate},#{otherAttr},#{sumScore})
mapper.select: SELECT d_c.id,d_c.content,d_c.userId,d_c.arrangeId, d_a.honorsAwardId, d3_a.honorsAwardId honorsAward3Id, u_d.id userHonorsAwardId,u_d.commitTime FROM t_honorsaward_content d_c LEFT JOIN t_honorsaward_arrange d_a ON d_c.arrangeId = d_a.id LEFT JOIN t_honorsaward3_arrange d3_a ON d_c.arrangeId = d3_a.id LEFT JOIN t_user_honorsaward u_d ON d_c.userId = u_d.userId and IFNULL(d_a.time,d3_a.time) = u_d.time and IFNULL(d_a.honorsAwardId,d3_a.honorsAwardId) = u_d.honorsAwardId WHERE d_c.year=#{year} and u_d.state = 1
